From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron leaps back out of Skullgrin's hands, and transforms, growing
back to his old proportions, and lands on his feet. "Transform
Skullgrin, and attack" he said, as he started to lift off the ground,
and he lifted his cannon up, taking aim on the Element. Again, the same
raw force of energy as before built up, as the force of the power
emerging sent Megatron's feet back against the ground, as he braced the
impact of his cannon's fury, and sent the blast of energy towards the
Element. He then turned around as he heard familiar thrusters.

"Come onnn, hurry up Switchblade" Speedbreaker said impatiently.
